subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: In the first leg against Real Madrid, Carlos Tevez created the first goal and scored the second for Juventus, an unlikely underdog in a Champions League semifinal round full of juggernauts.
snippet: In the first leg against Real Madrid, Carlos Tevez created the first goal and scored the second for Juventus, an unlikely underdog in a Champions League semifinal round full of juggernauts.
